content:
Based on the given scenario of a local retailer that sells car batteries and repairs car accessories like starters and alternators, the project limitations could be:

1. Technical limitations: The technology used to develop the system may have limitations that could affect the performance or functionality of the system.
2. Time constraints: The development of the system may take longer than expected and may not meet the desired deadline.
3. Budget constraints: The development of the system may require more resources than expected, leading to increased costs and budget limitations.
4. User adoption: Users may not be familiar with the system and may have difficulty adapting to the new platform, leading to a low rate of adoption.
5. Integration limitations: Integrating the e-commerce platform with the self-diagnosis tool and appointment scheduling function may pose challenges and limitations.
6. Data privacy and security: Ensuring the privacy and security of user data may be a challenge and could limit the functionality of the system.
7. Maintenance and support: Maintaining and supporting the system after it has been launched may also pose limitations and challenges.
